thread.title: Stocks That Were In News On July 24, 2015
thread.title_full: Stocks That Were In News On July 24, 2015

title: Stocks That Were In News On July 24, 2015
text:
Published: Friday, July 24, 2015, 15:46 [IST] Facebook Twitter Google+ Comments Mail 
The benchmark indices ended the trade in negative terrain, tracking weak global cues. 
The Sensex ended the day with losses of 258 points, while the Nifty fell 68 points in trade. 
Check the top gainers and losers in BSE & NSE stock market today . 
Wipro 
Shares in Wipro fell more than 3 per cent after its results lagged estimates. The stock was last trading at Rs 569, down 3.35 per cent over Thursday's close. 
The stock ended the day at Rs 567, lower by 3.64 per cent on BSE. It touched an intraday low of Rs 567 during the trade. 
Biocon 
Shares of the Biocon rose more than 3 per cent on Friday after the company reported strong set of Q1 numbers. 
The stock ended the day at Rs 467, higher by 1.90 per cent on BSE. It touched an intraday high at Rs 478 during the trade. 
United Spirits 
Stocks of United Spirits went up by over 5 per cent today after the company reported a standalone net profit of Rs 19.92 crore for the first quarter. 
The stock ended the day at Rs 3793, higher by 5.59 per cent on BSE. It touched an intraday high at Rs 3828 during the trade. 
IDFC 
Shares in IDFC rose after the company said that the Reserve Bank of India (RBI) has granted banking licence to IDFC Bank for undertaking banking business in the country. 
The stock ended the day at Rs 157, higher by 2.58 per cent on BSE. It touched an intraday high at Rs 163 during the trade. 
Rallis India 
Shares of Rallis India fell nearly 7 per cent during the trade on Bombay Stock Exchange (BSE) after the company posted tepid results for the June quarter. 
The stock ended the day at Rs 233, lower by 7.56 per cent on BSE. It touched an intraday low at Rs 229 during the trade.
